derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting the science of household management): from economic + the plural suffix -s, originally on the pattern of Greek ta oikonomika (plural), the name of a treatise by Aristotle. Current senses date from the late 18th cent

encyclopedia.content: 1.economics,即中文“经济学”。 2.economics,经济情况；经济因素；经济意义。

entry.def: Economics is the study of the way in which money, industry, and trade are organized in a society.

entry.def: The economics of a society or industry is the system of organizing money and trade in it.
